newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Can extends expiration of exchange.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Can extends expiration of exchange.

text.p: U.S. Can Corp said Thursday it is extending by 24 hours to 1700 EST March 14 the expiration date for its exchange offer for its 10-1/8 percent senior subordinated notes due 2006.
U.S. Can supplies metal containers for personal care, household, automotive and industrial products.
